name: On the space road, a cleaner week DEMOs
name_original: On the space road, a cleaner week DEMOs
description:
On the space road, a cleaner week DEMOs versions

It's the Demos of my game, this demos are there for receive advice and ideas from peoples and build a little community for start. By giving ideas or  return your feelings you can straight change the game for the better.

If you want follow the project, here my devlog:
https://itch.io/t/927614/on-the-space-road-a-cleaner-week

Current version :
Its the 1.0.0, a simple one level test. No customisation or choices, just want player feelings. (arrows, S, Q, D and F by default)

Please note that even if you play a demo, you load all sprites and not used scenes, so final version will not be much slower or bigger.
The first browsner load take more time. If you experience slow-down or can't charge the game consider downloading the exe version below.
